title: Belair
description: Travel Services can be integrated On-line with Belair On-line White Label Travel Solutions. Belair technology empowers the Travel Partner &  Affiliates to establish a fully functional On-line Travel Website offering Flights and other Travel Services.  Belair White Label Solutions are hosted on dedicated Secure Servers with live Inventory (API) from international & Domestic  Airlines, , LCC (Indian Low Cost) Domestic Carriers & as well GDS/CRS Full Service Carriers, and other service providers worldwide.
